bibl.title: Tiberius Claudius Isidorus: Alexandrian Gymnasiarch and Epistrategus of Thebaid.
bibl.note: Inscription (in honour of a Roman epistrategus) discovered in the early weeks of 2000, at the site of Kom el-Dikka in Alexandria, late I A.D.

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: LUKASZEWICZ Adam, Tiberius Claudius Isidorus: Alexandrian Gymnasiarch and Epistrategus of Thebaid.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 125-129 et pl. 11.
Inscription (in honour of a Roman epistrategus) discovered in the early weeks of 2000, at the site of Kom el-Dikka in Alexandria, late I A.D.
